entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with flurries at times heavy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
